10.1109/AI4G50087.2020.9311054.title: Building Ethical AI from News Articles
10.1109/AI4G50087.2020.9311054.author: Kim, Wonchul and Lee, Keeheon
10.1109/AI4G50087.2020.9311054.paperMotivationText: AI agents without ethics but only goal oriented could make decisions which overlook ethical values of societies. As a result, AI agents need to observe societies to find ethics of affiliated society. For AI agents to be successfully integrated into human societies, the agents must understand important values in the societies. Therefore there should be a way for AI agents to understand ethical values of human societies
10.1109/AI4G50087.2020.9311054.paperContributionText: The paper shows how to extract ethical values and moral values from news articles using natural language processing.
10.1109/AI4G50087.2020.9311054.paperResultsText: The result shows that from newspaper articles ethical and moral values could be extracted and modeled for AI agents to refer.
10.1109/AI4G50087.2020.9311054.dataDomainOtherText: Mixed (newspaper articles that contain moral words
